official_title: A bill to clarify the jurisdiction of the Special Inspector General for Pandemic Recovery, and for other purposes.
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text: This bill provides funds for the Special Inspector General for Pandemic Recovery for each of FY2022-FY2025. The amounts provided by the bill are designated as an emergency requirement pursuant to the Statutory Pay-As-You-Go Act of 2010 (PAYGO) and the Senate PAYGO rule. (This excludes the budget effects from being counted for the purposes of enforcing the PAYGO rules.)
